bibl.title: The Race in the Athenian Oschophoria and an Oschophoricon by Pindar.
bibl.note: A decisive proof that the Oschophoria involved a race can be elicited from P. Oxy. XXVI, 2451 B fr. 17 (= Pack2 1358). - Appendix A (pp. 48-50): Text of P. Oxy. 2451 B fr. 17. - Appendix B (pp. 50-51): The Case of Pindar Paean XIII.
Rutherford Ian and James Irvine, The Race in the Athenian Oschophoria and an Oschophoricon by Pindar.
